beer.name: Bourbon County Stout
beer.description: Brewed in honor of the 1000th batch at our original Clybourn brewpub. A liquid as dark and dense as a black hole with thick foam the color of a bourbon barrel. The nose is an intense mix of charred oak, chocolate, vanilla, caramel and smoke. One sip has more flavor than your average case of beer. A great cigar beer.
beer.grains: 2-Row, Munich, Chocolate, Caramel, Roast Barley, Debittered Black
2-Row, Munich, Chocolate, Caramel, Roast Barley, Debittered Black
